title: informations disclosure(Email,Numbers,Agreements, admin Sessions and more ...) through a PostgreSQL  database belongs to (legium-back.corp.mail.ru)

structured_scope.asset_identifier: Ext. O: Delegated subdomain or branded partner service

activities.new_scope: Ext. O: Acquisitions, not integrated to Mail.Ru infrastructure and external cloud services

activities.old_scope: Ext. O: Acquisitions, not integrated to Mail.Ru infrastructure and external cloud services
activities.new_scope: Ext. O: Delegated subdomain or branded partner service

summaries.content: Reported a vulnerability in ```legium.io``` cloud service, which is not part of Mail.Ru. ```legium.io``` is located outside the Mail.Ru infrastructure and does not have access to our company's product data. According to the rules in this case the service refers to Ext.O (Third party project). While ```legium.io``` could be tested or occasionally used by Mail.Ru employees, it's not used in any regular processes and there is no sensitive data of Mail.Ru users or employees belonging to Mail.Ru in ```legium.io```.

Hi,
This is my summary about this report: 

https://aob-89072.medium.com/how-mailru-handled-with-my-report-on-their-program-5e1f587ecaa 

@aleks_grishin said that this db is only for testing, I added informations about 3 persons on the report including their (Passeports number + Phone number + Username and last name + OGRN + INN + ADRESS + EMAIL.), I'm sure they are real persons and one of them is famous. 2 agreements signed on 2020, and one of them is on 2021. I have also agreements the day before I sent the report.

This db contains all agreements signed on legium.io including any company and it's almost 325 MB 

You were connecting to this database from legium.corp.mail.ru and users also did that, https://legium-back.corp.mail.ru is the same as api.legium.io, how they could create or upload the same script on your servers, and not mcs.mail.ru one, it's the *.corp.mail.ru.
Impossible to have the same credentials you did for https://legium.corp.mail.ru as the crendentials for the main subdomain api.legium.io where the database is .
all legium data are stored on the same database.

The db credentials was founded on ext.A subdomain. Not ext.O

all URLs of images are on the database : the Same URls from "legium-data" S3 bucket

I added also a screenshot about legium.corp.mail.ru, that legium.io signing agreements for Mailru Group.
and also https://skillbox.legium.io => belongs to Skillbox.ru => Mailru informations there too

@aleks_grishin said that "Legium and Mail.Ru Group not partners and there is no reward for this data." And you have no relation with the ip where database i accessed, why you just didn't close the report as N/A as you did with my old reports when its out of scope?
{F1437100} 

@aleks_grishin, @kpebetka triaged the report without changing the scope,then you changed the scope, the he changed it again.  Do you guys don't know what your scope is? 

No one knows Mailru's scope more than @kpebetka, but he confirmed the scope at the 1st time and always did it 


#My report wasn't treated fairly. this db isn't for testing or contains informations related to MailRu
